fields.description:
Request to update euca2ools to have common arguments, just as EC2 API and AMI
provide.  Also, if the correct options are not passed to a given euca2ools,
then the output of proper usage should be displayed.

  
For more information, please see the following links:

  
http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/index.htm
l?CLTRG-common-args-api.html

  
http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/index.htm
l?CLTRG-common-args-ami.html

  
--   
Harold L Spencer, Jr.

Technical Support Engineer

  
Eucalyptus Systems,Inc.

6755 Hollister Ave., Ste. 200 | Goleta, CA | 93117

Office: 805-845-8000

harold.spencer.jr@eucalyptus.com

comments.body:
Originally posted on 2011-07-24 20:52:39 by harold.spencer@eucalyptus.com

Sun Jul 24 13:52:38 2011: Request 2912 was acted upon.
 Transaction: Ticket created by harold.spencer.jr
       Queue: Feature Requests
     Subject: euca2ools Common Options
       Owner: dan.nurmi
  Requestors: harold.spencer@eucalyptus.com
Organization: 
      Status: new
 Ticket <URL: https://support.eucalyptus.com/Ticket/Display.html?id=2912 >


Request to update euca2ools to have common arguments, just as EC2 API and AMI
provide. Also, if the correct options are not passed to a given euca2ools, then
the output of proper usage should be displayed.

For more information, please see the following links:

http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/index.html?CLTRG-common-args-api.html

http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/index.html?CLTRG-common-args-ami.html

--
Harold L Spencer, Jr.
Technical Support Engineer

Eucalyptus Systems,Inc.
6755 Hollister Ave., Ste. 200 | Goleta, CA | 93117
Office: 805-845-8000
harold.spencer.jr@eucalyptus.com

Originally posted on 2011-07-25 02:55:03 by admin
On Sun Jul 24 13:52:38 2011, harold.spencer.jr wrote:

> Request to update euca2ools to have common arguments, just as EC2 API

> and AMI

> provide. Also, if the correct options are not passed to a given

> euca2ools, then

> the output of proper usage should be displayed.

>

> For more information, please see the following links:

>

> http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/index.h
tml?CLTRG-

> common-args-api.html

>

> http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/CommandLineReference/index.h
tml?CLTRG-

> common-args-ami.html

>

> --

> Harold L Spencer, Jr.

> Technical Support Engineer

>

> Eucalyptus Systems,Inc.

> 6755 Hollister Ave., Ste. 200 | Goleta, CA | 93117

> Office: 805-845-8000

> harold.spencer.jr@eucalyptus.com

  
We do support quite a few of the common options listed in the links above.  Is
this request about adding support for the remaining ones?  Or about changing
the documentation and help to refer to them as "Common Options"?  Or both?

  
BTW, I think I should own this issue but it's currently assigned to Dan and it
seems I'm unable to take it.

Hey Mitch,

  
Its a request to support the remaining ones.  Does it still not show you as
the owner of the ticket?  I just checked and it shows that you are.  Let me
know if there is something that we need to fix here.  Thanks for looking into
this.

  
Regards,

--   
Harold L Spencer, Jr.
